name: Chladni's Confusion
description: 'The German scientist Ernst Chladni was one of the pioneers of experimental acoustics. His research on different kinds of vibrations served as the basis for the scientific understanding of sound that later emerged in the 19th century.' Analogue video art, run through 2 Edirol V4 videomixer, a hardware glitch module, sent to a CRT and recorded on camera. Follow me on Twitter: @LotteZ13 Website: www.lottez.com Instagram.com/LotteZproductions.
